overview: This dynamic live performance by Freddie MacGregor -- one of the architects of roots reggae -- highlights his music's trademark spirituality and irresistible grooves. The video was originally released as a companion to the audio CD anthology "Show Me Your Roots," which honors the masters of roots reggae with a selection of tracks by Luciano, Gregory Isaacs, Garnet Silk and Morgan Heritage, among others.
title: Show Me Your Roots
